name: ACHIEVEMENT_AVENGER_THROUGH_TIME
description: Defeat Loremaster Astaroth in the Tutorial Adventure.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GREATER_AVENGER
description: Defeat Loremaster Astaroth and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech at the same time in the Tutorial Adventure.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BLESSED_SAVIOUR
description: Save Warfell and Sadina from the Curse of Undeath in the Tutorial Adventure.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GREAT_LEADER
description: Start the module Augury of Chaos with four different parties.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_TREASURE_HUNTER
description: Collect 100,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_TREASURE_FINDER
description: Collect 500,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_TREASURE_EXPERT
description: Collect 1,000,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_TREASURE_MASTER
description: Collect 2,000,000 gold coins in Augury of Chaos and collect all of the hidden gems in the wilderness around Finchbury in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DARK_SORCERER_OVERLORD
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DARK_SORCERER_MASTER
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep in Archmage mode without using any of the supporting options. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DARK_SORCERER_EXPERT
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DARK_SORCERER_ADEPT
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos in the Throne Room of Gleegold Keep.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BANE_OF_THE_ARCHDAEMON
description: Fight and destroy the Greater Demon named Maphistor.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BANE_OF_THE_ARCHLICH
description: Fight the Archlich Xadriphar and use a powerful item to destroy it permanently.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SWORN_ENEMY_OF_THE_ARCHLICH
description: Fight the Archlich Xadriphar in his tomb, at the Gate of Gleegold Keep and in the Throne Room all in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NEGOTIATOR
description: Deal with the Giant Spiders in the Mysterious Cave near Finchbury diplomatically both to release the boys and move through Giant Spider territory.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ENFORCER
description: Slay the Giant Spiders in the Mysterious Cave near Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ASCENDANCY_OVERLORD
description: Complete the transformation ritual with mages of all five schools of magic in Ironman mode in Augury of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ASCENDANCY_MASTER
description: Complete the transformation ritual with a Wizard or Sorcerer in Ironman mode in Augury of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ASCENDANCY_EXPERT
description: Complete the transformation ritual with mages of all five schools of magic in Augury of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ASCENDANCY_ADEPT
description: Complete the transformation ritual with a Wizard or Sorcerer in Augury of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_LIBERATOR
description: Free the Genie called Lokkad from the enslavement of the enchanted lamp.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CHARACTER_MASTER
description: Create characters of all 22 Character Classes.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_REDEEMER
description: Save Dunwell from the Curse of Melianar at the inn of the Golden Griffon in Finchbury and pardon the Warlock Pizarra in the High Sewers in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_IRON_JUDGE
description: Deliver Dunwell to Melianar's Babau at the inn of the Golden Griffon in Finchbury and administer justice to Pizarra in the High Sewers in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_FRIEND_OF_THE_WATER_SPHERE
description: Recruit the Mantis Aquamancer named Zalapha.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_FRIEND_OF_THE_FIRE_SPHERE
description: Recruit the Drake Pyromancer named Sardabbras.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_RAMPAGER
description: Defeat Zalapha, Sardabbras and the maximum number of Fire Elementals in the Mysterious Cave.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_FIRE_ELEMENTAL_SLAYER
description: Rest near the river of lava in the Mysterious Cave and then defeat all of the monsters in the area.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SUPREME_KNIGHT_OF_COMPASSION
description: Save all of the Blue Cloaks during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SUPREME_KNIGHT_PROTECTOR
description: Defeat all of the monsters during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury and recover the Artifact Warhammer Geodesis.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SUPREME_KNIGHT_COMMANDER
description: Defend the village during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SUPREME_KNIGHT_VETERAN
description: Defend the village during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SUPREME_KNIGHT_WARRIOR
description: Defend the village during the Goblin invasion of Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SEA_HAG_MASTER
description: Defeat the Sea Hags in the Red Cave near Finchbury in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SEA_HAG_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Sea Hags in the Red Cave near Finchbury in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SEA_HAG_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Sea Hags in the Red Cave near Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_LIZARDMAN_SLAYER
description: Defeat the group of Lizardman leader Assyrik in the Green Cave near Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHARKMAN_SLAYER
description: Defeat the group of Sharkman leader Scaddon in the Green Cave near Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SEA_LORD
description: Defeat both the Sharkman Scaddon and the Lizardman Assyrik in the Green Cave near Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GIANT_SPIDER_MASTER
description: Defeat Giant Spider Queen Sattram in the High Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GIANT_SPIDER_EXPERT
description: Defeat Giant Spider Queen Sattram in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GIANT_SPIDER_SLAYER
description: Defeat Giant Spider Queen Sattram in the High Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WEAPONCRAFTING_MASTER
description: Create a +10 weapon or armour in Ironman mode in Augury of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WEAPONCRAFTING_EXPERT
description: Create a +10 weapon in Augury of Chaos in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WEAPONCRAFTING_ADEPT
description: Create a +10 weapon in Augury of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_JOURNEYMAN
description: Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 2 in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ADEPT
description: Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 5 in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_EXPERT
description: Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 10 in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MASTER
description: Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 15 in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GRAND_MASTER
description: Start Augury of Chaos with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals and reach level 20 in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MASTER_TACTICIAN
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos and Pizarra in the Chapel of Chaos in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_EXPERT_TACTICIAN
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos and Pizarra in the Chapel of Chaos in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ADEPT_TACTICIAN
description: Defeat the forces of Yanos and Pizarra in the Chapel of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_EXPERIMENTER
description: Drink from the Pool of Raw Chaos in the Chapel of Chaos.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_TRIPLE_STRIKE
description: Defeat the three Lieutenants of Grand Master Yanos - Vikaras, Thogar and Pizarra - in the Chapel of Chaos in the same game. You must defeat Thogar and Pizarra in the same battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WITCH_MASTER
description: Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones in the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WITCH_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WITCH_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones in the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GLADIATOR
description: Defeat the group of Draggor, the Coven's Champion, in five rounds at the most in the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEMONIC_ALLIANCE
description: Defeat the Coven of the Four Crones with the help of Greater Demon Maphistor.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ARCANE_LOREMASTER
description: Obtain level-9 magic scrolls from the Coven of the Four Crones.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GOBLIN_KING_MASTER
description: Defeat the Green Goblin King named Tribulus in the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GOBLIN_KING_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Green Goblin King named Tribulus in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_GOBLIN_KING_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Green Goblin King named Tribulus in the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MARILITH_MASTER
description: Defeat the forces of the Flaming Skull at the Gate of Gleegold Keep in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MARILITH_EXPERT
description: Defeat the forces of the Flaming Skull at the Gate of Gleegold Keep in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MARILITH_SLAYER
description: Defeat the forces of the Flaming Skull at the Gate of Gleegold Keep.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_RED_DRAGON_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Red Dragon Barramthaghor in the Courtyard of Gleegold Keep without receiving aid from any allies.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WARLOCK_MASTER
description: Defeat the forces of Pizarra and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech in the High Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WARLOCK_EXPERT
description: Defeat the forces of Pizarra and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WARLOCK_ADEPT
description: Defeat the forces of Pizarra and the Ice Devil Fizzarmelech in the High Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ANGELIC_ALLIANCE
description: Call on the Angel named Lyrian in two crucial battles and keep her alive both times.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MASTER_TRICKSTER
description: Create two copies of the Book of the Dead and give them to two interested creatures.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SOUL_SUCKER_MASTER
description: Defeat the Soul Sucker Mastermind in the High Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SOUL_SUCKER_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Soul Sucker Mastermind in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SOUL_SUCKER_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Soul Sucker Mastermind in the High Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_EFREETI_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Efreeti called Scadulgon in the Low Sewers in four rounds at the most.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_EVIL_EYE_VANQUISHER
description: Free the prisoners of the Evil Eye Emperor in the High Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ARENA_MASTER
description: Defeat the Green Goblins or the Grey Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ARENA_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Green Goblins or the Grey Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BANE_OF_THE_GREEN_GOBLINS
description: Defeat the Green Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BANE_OF_THE_GREY_GOBLINS
description: Defeat the Grey Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DESTROYER
description: Defeat both the Grey Goblins and the Green Goblins in the battle arena of the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_HYDRA_MASTER
description: Defeat the Lizardman King Largoss and the Great Hydra Hyatulob at the same time in the Low Sewers in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_HYDRA_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Lizardman King Largoss and the Great Hydra Hyatulob at the same time in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_HYDRA_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Lizardman King Largoss and the Great Hydra Hyatulob at the same time in the Low Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHADOW_MASTER
description: Complete the three night-time quests in Finchbury in one go in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHADOW_EXPERT
description: Complete the three night-time quests in Finchbury in one go in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHADOW_ADEPT
description: Complete the three night-time quests in Finchbury in one go.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHARKMAN_DRUID_MASTER
description: Defeat the Sharkman Druid in the Water Shrine in Ironman mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHARKMAN_DRUID_EXPERT
description: Defeat the Sharkman Druid in the Water Shrine in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SHARKMAN_DRUID_SLAYER
description: Defeat the Sharkman Druid in the Water Shrine.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ARCHAEOLOGIST
description: Retrieve the buried treasure of the Sharkman Druid in the High Sewers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_MASTER_GAMBLER
description: Play Shingoro with Rothgar and win the final match at the inn of the Golden Griffon in Finchbury.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_PARTNERSHIP
description: Call on the boys Garret and Perry in Finchbury two times in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_OPPORTUNIST
description: Collect loot from the bandits in Finchbury two times, then defeat them and collect the reward.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_HOLY_RESCUER
description: Rescue both Erzimon and Asharzaelle and recruit them in the Low Sewers in Archmage mode. You must start with level-one characters complying with racial ability score totals.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_FRIEND_OF_THE_RATMEN
description: Have a group of Ratmen help you in recovering the Vanishing Sword in Finchbury and deal with the Ratmen peacefully in the Low Sewers in the same game.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SWORN_ENEMY_OF_THE_RATMEN
description: Fight the ratmen both when looking for the Vanishing Sword and when exploring the Low Sewers in the same game.
